reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is an exceptional instructor. Her lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Always available during office hours.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Johnson makes it interesting. His enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's passion for literature is evident in every lecture. She encourages critical thinking and fosters great discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows his stuff, but his lectures can be dry. Exams are fair, though.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Best professor I've had at Berkeley! Dr. Goldstein makes complex topics easy to understand and her lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's lectures are like time travel. He brings historical events to life with his storytelling.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is not only knowledgeable but also approachable. Her research-focused approach is refreshing.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wong is brilliant, but sometimes moves too fast in lectures. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's enthusiasm for chemistry is infectious. Lab work can be challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-blowing lectures! Prof. Brown challenges you to think deeply about life's big questions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Kim brings real-world examples into her lectures, making sociological concepts relatable and interesting.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor knows his subject well, but can be a bit disorganized. Interesting discussions in class though.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Ivanova's passion for languages is contagious. Her classes are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. His knowledge of art is impressive.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's commitment to environmental issues is inspiring. Her field trips are the highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia makes programming fun! His projects are challenging but great learning experiences.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Wright's lectures are fascinating. She brings anthropology to life with her fieldwork stories.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Prof. Tanner has great industry experience, but his teaching style can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is at the cutting edge of neuroscience research. Her classes are challenging but incredibly informative.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Chang makes statistics accessible and even fun! His real-world examples really help in understanding concepts.
